metadata.title: CVE-2022-32749 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability handling requests in Apache Traffic Server allows an attacker to crash the server under certain conditions. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from 8.0.0 through 9.1.3.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
